thread.title: Rossco Faithfull
thread.title_full: Enchanting Travels reviewed by Rossco Faithfull

author: Rossco Faithfull
title: Rossco Faithfull
text:
In January 2017 I travelled with my parents and brother and sister to India where I was born in 1965, as my father managed a tea estate near Ooty in Tamilnadu. This trip was especially memorable for my elderly parents who have many fond memories of India. Everything was arranged by Enchanting Travels, who have extensive in-country experience, and we can't recommend them enough. They arranged our return flights, a private van with a driver, all accommodation and interesting local tours and guides. Everything went according to plan with no unexpected problems, and we returned home safely after a wonderful trip. We will recommend Enchanting Travels to all our friends, and anyone else thinking of traveling to India and other places where they operate.
Rossco Faithfull
Bangalow, NSW, Australia
